Good Comments: English text deviates too much from the Japanese. A lot of things that are implied in the original are stated as fact in the sub.
Excellent sub, with TL notes for things that, in this anime particularly, could always use more explanation.
Unnecessary ads for the subgroup inserted at the beginning, middle and end of the episode. Too liberal usage of TL notes, I don't want a TL note for 'Ittadakimasu', just translate it.
Bad Comments: I believe that they accurately translate from Japanese into English, and their subtitles are easy on the eyes [doesn't take away anything from the video].

Good Comments: Papyrus is an odd choice for a subtitling font, but the overall quality of the subs was very good.
Bad Comments: as always, a very elegant translation from Anime-Kraze; nice font, too, suited to the anime's style, easily readable and unintrusive. Cultural/historical notes are an appreciated plus.
